RelatedSentence: In May 2013 , a jury found the 33 - year - old guilty of first - degree murder in the ghastly death of her former boyfriend Travis Alexander in his Phoenix home in 2008 .
However , the jurors failed to reach a unanimous decision on her sentencing .
